channel.title: Some SRl problem when creating scripts!
channel.description:
Hello.
I can run every script which uses SRL (and is correctly written of course :P) but when I try to create my own scripts the scar window says "Double Indentifier 'X' in SRL/Core/Mining.scar" and such.. Why is this happening?
Big thanks in advance!

item.title: Some SRl problem when creating scripts!
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath.v2 Aftermath.v2
item.description:
@Aftermath.v2 wrote:

[quote=“Zyphik, post:1, topic:12947”]Hello.

I can run every script which uses SRL (and is correctly written of course :P) but when I try
to create my own scripts the scar window says “Double Indentifier ‘X’ in SRL/Core/Mining.scar” and such…
Why is this happening?

Big thanks in advance![/quote]

X and Y already exists in SRL. Name it something like MyX and MyY.

Read full topic
item.source: Some SRl problem when creating scripts!

if im not using srl and define x,y, it works fine
